  By not providing "Findnsol.cmake" in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH this project has
  asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by "nsol", but
  CMake did not find one.

  Could not find a package configuration file provided by "nsol" with any of
  the following names:

    nsolConfig.cmake
    nsol-config.cmake

  Add the installation prefix of "nsol" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or set
  "nsol_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above files.  If "nsol"
  provides a separate development package or SDK, be sure it has been
  installed.
